flawed_nl_solution:

In round two, Jeff completed 16 - 3 = <<16-3=13>>13.
In round three, Jeff completed 16 + 4 = <<16+4=24>>24.

Jeff completed 15 + 13 + 24 + 8 = <<15+13+24+8=60>>60 skips in total.
Jeff skipped an average of 60 / 4 = <<60/4=15>>15 skips per round.
